devdoc.author: Hiskander Aguillon
devdoc.details: Uses a simplified constant product formula without fees.

params.amountADesired: Amount of token A desired to add
params.amountAMin: Minimum amount of token A to add (slippage protection)
params.amountBDesired: Amount of token B desired to add
params.amountBMin: Minimum amount of token B to add (slippage protection)
params.deadline: Time after which the transaction is invalid

returns.amountA: Actual amount of token A added
returns.amountB: Actual amount of token B added

returns.price: The price of 1 tokenA in tokenB units

params.amountAMin: Minimum amount of token A to receive (slippage protection)
params.amountBMin: Minimum amount of token B to receive (slippage protection)
params.liquidity: Amount of liquidity tokens to burn

params.amountIn: Amount of input tokens to send
params.amountOutMin: Minimum amount of output tokens to receive (slippage protection)
params.deadline: Time after which the transaction is invalid
params.path: Array with exactly 2 elements: input token and output token addresses

devdoc.title: SimpleSwap - A simple token swap and liquidity pool contract

LiquidityAdded(address,address,address,u.notice: Emitted when liquidity is added to a pool

LiquidityRemoved(address,address,address.notice: Emitted when liquidity is removed from a pool

Swap(address,address,address,uint256,uin.notice: Emitted when a swap is executed

TokensSwapped(address,address,address,ui.notice: Emitted when a swap is executed

addLiquidity(address,address,uint256,uin.notice: Add liquidity to the pool for a token pair

getAmountOut(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Calculates output amount given an input amount and reserves

getPrice(address,address).notice: Returns the price of tokenB in terms of tokenA (18 decimals)

removeLiquidity(address,address,uint256,.notice: Removes liquidity from a token pair pool and returns the tokens to the user

swapExactTokensForTokens(uint256,uint256.notice: Swaps an exact amount of input tokens for as many output tokens as possible

userdoc.notice: This contract allows users to add/remove liquidity and swap between two ERC20 tokens.
